title: Apple starts manufacturing iPhone 13 models in India
content:
Apple started manufacturing iPhones in India back in 2017. The company initially started with the original iPhone SE, but it has since added the iPhone 11 and iPhone 12 to the mix. According to a recent report fromÂ Mint, Apple has now announced that it will also manufacture its latest iPhone 13 models in the country.

The post Apple starts manufacturing iPhone 13 models in India appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has confirmed that it has started manufacturing its latest iPhone 13 lineup in India. Read on to learn more.
